summary: A woman hesitantly rents an apartment to an eerie man who she soon realizes has a part in the solar eclipse that is taking place.
cast: Cristina Brondo|Camila Bordonaba|Berta Muñiz|Arnaldo André|Mirella Pascual|Victoria Witemburg|Diego Cremonesi|Gustavo Garzón|Hernan Penner|Gimena Blesa|Sebastián De Caro|Jorge Gallego|Ana Luna|Omar Musa|María Nela Sinisterra
keywords: solar eclipse|tied feet|spanish woman|one word title|buenos aires argentina
director: Directors: Adrián García Bogliano, Ramiro García Bogliano
title: Penumbra
